Topic.Title: For people who like to edit other people's code (I fixed my original problem YAY!)

Posts.EditableText:
I FIXED IT....Buttttttt....
if you still feel like editing my code....
Here's My code.... (I know there's probably a lot wrong....)
If you just want to edit the code directly, instead of just telling me, (Since there's alot here) let me know who you are (so i can credit you) and you can edit it here: https://goo.gl/gGj7B1
Just put a comment in what you changed, and once I get it up and running again, I'll post it back to it's rightful place here on textadventures.....
